title: Best midlaners or junglers to carry my awful friends in an important game?
body: I need like 3-5 midlaners  or junglers that i can just play over and over again until June. Me and my friends are playing a game vs some other people, and everyone on my team is really bad except for the support. Everyone on the other team has about 1000+ games played and im assuming they are all at least gold. The only way i can see us winning is if i win lane so hard that i can carry their heavy asses to victory. My usual 1v9 champ is Fizz, but I'm afraid I'll get banned out. Pls halp.

replies.body:
How many games is it? Best of 1,3, 5? Have they played with you before to see your Fizz?

I was going to say just your best OTP. But I guess that won't work.
